text: Bar-le-Duc is a commune. It is found in the Meuse department in the east of France. ==Sister cities== Bar-le-Duc is twinned with: * Tambov, Russia * Griesheim, Germany, since 1975 * Wilkau-Haßlau, Germany, since 1990 * Gyönk, Hungary, since 1995 Category:Communes in Meuse Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Bar-le-Duc
